code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductForm=_ref=>{let{products,onAddProduct}=_ref;const[selectedProduct,setSelectedProduct]=useState('');const[quantity,setQuantity]=useState(1);const handleAddProduct=()=>{if(selectedProduct&&quantity>0){onAddProduct({product:selectedProduct,quantity});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:selectedProduct,onChange:e=>setSelectedProduct(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Select Product"}),products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:product._id,children:product.name},product._id))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:quantity,onChange:e=>setQuantity(e.target.value),min:"1",placeholder:"Quantity"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddProduct,children:"Add Product"})]});};export default ProductForm;
